com.persistit.logging

Interface PersistitLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPersistitLogger, Slf4jAdapter

    public interface PersistitLogger
    Simple interface for attaching an external logger.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Called when Persistit stops using the log.
      void flush()
      Flush pending ouput
      boolean isLoggable(PersistitLevel level)
      Test whether a message at the specified level should be written to the log.
      void log(PersistitLevel level, String message)
      Write the message to the log at the specified level.
      void open()
      Called when Persistit starts using the log.

    • Method Detail

      • log

        void log(PersistitLevel level,
         String message)
        Write the message to the log at the specified level. Configuration will ensure that this method is called only when the level is indeed loggable.
        Parameters:
        level - The level of the log event
        message - A string-valued description of the event

      • isLoggable

        boolean isLoggable(PersistitLevel level)
        Test whether a message at the specified level should be written to the log. This method is called during configuration, not once per log message.
        Parameters:
        level - The level of the log event
        Returns:
        whether a message should be logged at the specified level

      • open

        void open()
   throws Exception
        Called when Persistit starts using the log.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • close

        void close()
    throws Exception
        Called when Persistit stops using the log.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flush pending ouput
